Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.salesOverTimeDescription: Total sales over the last 30 days.
Dashboard.recentSalesDescription: A quick look at your latest transactions.
Dashboard.lowStockDescription: These products are at or below their reorder point.
Dashboard.noLowStock: All products are above their reorder points. Great job!

ReportsPage.title: Reports
ReportsPage.pageDescription: Generate new reports using natural language with our AI assistant, or view, manage, and delete your previously saved reports below.
ReportsPage.queryDescription: Describe the report you want to generate in natural language. The AI will interpret your request, fetch the data, and build the report for you.
ReportsPage.queryPlaceholder: e.g., 'Show me total sales per category for last month', or 'List all products with less than 20 items in stock, ordered by quantity.'
ReportsPage.errorQueryEmpty: Please enter a description of the report you want to generate.
ReportsPage.errorGeneratingReport: An error occurred while generating the report: {error}
ReportsPage.loadingDescription: The AI is analyzing your request and fetching data. This may take a moment.
ReportsPage.querySales: Generate a sales report for the current month, grouped by day.
ReportsPage.queryBestSellers: List the top 10 best-selling products by quantity sold all time.
ReportsPage.queryStock: List all products with a stock quantity of less than 20 units, ordered by quantity ascending.
ReportsPage.queryFrequentClients: List the top 10 most frequent clients by number of transactions.
ReportsPage.queryPendingDispatches: Generate a report of all sales with a 'Pending' dispatch status.
ReportsPage.listDescription: View and manage your previously saved reports.
ReportsPage.noReportsFound: No reports have been saved yet.
ReportsPage.noReportsHint: You can generate and save new reports from the AI Reports page.
ReportsPage.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the report "{reportName}"? This action cannot be undone.
ReportsPage.reportDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief summary of what this report contains
ReportsPage.saveReportDialogDescription: Save the generated report for future access.
ReportsPage.aiNotConfigured: The AI reporting feature is disabled. Please set your Gemini API Key in the settings to enable it.

POSPage.scanBarPlaceholder: Scan barcode or type product name...
POSPage.cartEmpty: Your cart is empty. Add products to get started.
POSPage.errorFetchingInitialData: Could not load initial client, tax, promotion, or payment method data.

POSPage.noTaxSelectedError: Please select a tax to add.
POSPage.selectCartToCheckout: Select a cart to begin checkout.
POSPage.noPendingCarts: No carts are pending for checkout.

DispatchManager.title: Dispatch Manager
DispatchManager.listDescription: Review and process inventory dispatches for completed sales.
DispatchManager.searchPlaceholder: Search by sale ID or client name...
DispatchManager.dispatchFailedNoItems: No items selected for dispatch. Please enter a quantity greater than zero for at least one item.
DispatchManager.dispatchFailedError: An error occurred while dispatching items.
DispatchManager.dispatchSuccessPartial: Items for sale #{saleId} have been partially dispatched.
DispatchManager.dialogDescription: Review items and update stock levels. Dispatched quantities cannot be undone.
DispatchManager.alreadyDispatchedDescription: All items for this sale have already been dispatched from inventory.
DispatchManager.noItemsToDispatch: All items for this sale have been dispatched.
DispatchManager.noPendingDispatches: No dispatches found for the selected criteria.

ProductManagementPage.title: Product Management
ProductManagementPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the product "{productName}".
ProductManagementPage.errorFetchingProducts: Could not fetch products from the server.
ProductManagementPage.invalidFileTypeError: Invalid file type. Please select a JSON or CSV file.
ProductManagementPage.jsonParseErrorDescription: Could not parse the selected file. Please ensure it is valid.

AddProductDialog.dialogDescription: Fill in the details below to add a new product to your inventory.
AddProductDialog.positiveOrZeroError: Must be a positive number or zero.

EditProductDialog.dialogDescription: Update the details for "{productName}". Click save when you're done.

ProductListTable.noProductsMessage: No products found. Click "Add New Product" to get started.

GridSettingsDialog.title: Customize Grid View
GridSettingsDialog.description: Select columns to display, change their order, set grouping, and apply templates or saved configurations.
GridSettingsDialog.templatesDescription: Select a predefined template or one of your saved configurations to quickly apply settings.
GridSettingsDialog.saveCurrentConfigurationLabel: Save Current View as New Configuration
GridSettingsDialog.configSavedSuccessDescription: Configuration "{name}" saved successfully to your browser.
GridSettingsDialog.errorSavingConfig: Could not save configuration to local storage.
GridSettingsDialog.groupingSelectedLabel: {count, plural, one {# column} other {# columns}} grouped by
GridSettingsDialog.groupingDescription: Select columns to group by. Order of selection matters for hierarchy.

ImportProductsSettingsDialog.title: Import Settings
ImportProductsSettingsDialog.description: Importing {count} items from "{fileName}". Configure advanced settings below.

AdvancedImportDialog.uploadDescription: Upload a CSV or Excel file to import data into the system.
AdvancedImportDialog.dragDropPrompt: Drag & drop your file here, or
AdvancedImportDialog.errorNotEnoughRows: File must contain a header row and at least one data row.
AdvancedImportDialog.mappingDescription: Match the columns from your file to the corresponding fields in the {modelName} model.
AdvancedImportDialog.confirmDescription: Review the settings and a preview of your data before starting the import of {count} rows from {fileName}.

ThemeManagerPage.title: Theme Manager
ThemeManagerPage.addNewThemeDescription: Create a new visual theme with a unique name.
ThemeManagerPage.themeSetDefaultSuccessDescription: Theme "{themeName}" is now the default theme.

AddThemeDialog.title: Add New Theme
AddThemeDialog.description: Enter a name for your new theme. Colors and fonts will be generated randomly.

EditThemeDialog.title: Edit Theme: {themeName}
EditThemeDialog.description: Customize the fonts and HSL color values for this theme.

TranslationsManagerPage.title: Translations Manager
TranslationsManagerPage.listDescription: Modify the text for different languages used throughout the application. Changes are saved automatically per row.
TranslationsManagerPage.saveSuccessDescription: Translation for key '{key}' has been updated.

LanguagesManagerPage.title: Languages Manager
LanguagesManagerPage.description: Add, remove, and configure the languages available in the application.
LanguagesManagerPage.applyAndRestartTooltip: Saves the current enabled/default language configuration to src/i18n-config.ts. A server restart is required for these changes to take full effect on routing and middleware.
LanguagesManagerPage.addNewLanguageTooltip: Define a new language for use in the app.
LanguagesManagerPage.warningDescription: After enabling/disabling languages or changing the default, you must click 'Apply & Update Config File' and then restart your application server for the changes to fully apply.
LanguagesManagerPage.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the language "{langName}"? This will also remove any associated translation data.

AppLanguageListTable.noLanguagesMessage: No languages configured. Click 'Add New Language' to begin.

AccessDenied.title: Acceso Denegado

RolesPermissionsPage.title: Roles y Permisos
RolesPermissionsPage.descriptionEdit: Selecciona un rol para ver y editar sus permisos asignados. Los permisos del rol Administrador no son editables.

LoginPage.title: Inicia Sesión en Tu Cuenta
LoginPage.description: Ingresa tus credenciales para acceder a la aplicación.
LoginPage.loginErrorDescription: Correo o contraseña inválidos. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.

ForgotPasswordDialog.title: ¿Olvidaste tu Contraseña?
ForgotPasswordDialog.description: Ingresa tu correo y te enviaremos un enlace para restablecer tu contraseña.
ForgotPasswordDialog.requestSuccessDescription: Si existe una cuenta con ese correo, se ha enviado un enlace para restablecer la contraseña.
ForgotPasswordDialog.requestFailedError: Ocurrió un error. Por favor, inténtalo más tarde.

AccountSetupPage.title: Configura Tu Cuenta
AccountSetupPage.description: Completa la configuración de tu cuenta eligiendo una contraseña.
AccountSetupPage.passwordMinLengthError: La contraseña debe tener al menos 8 caracteres.
AccountSetupPage.setupFailedError: Error al configurar la cuenta. El enlace puede ser inválido o haber expirado.
AccountSetupPage.setupSuccessDescription: Ahora puedes iniciar sesión con tu nueva contraseña.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Restablece Tu Contraseña
ResetPasswordPage.description: Crea una nueva contraseña para tu cuenta.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordMinLengthError: La contraseña debe tener al menos 8 caracteres.
ResetPasswordPage.resetFailedError: Error al restablecer la contraseña. El enlace puede ser inválido o haber expirado.
ResetPasswordPage.resetSuccessDescription: Ahora puedes iniciar sesión con tu nueva contraseña.

SessionExpiration.title: La Sesión Expirará Pronto
SessionExpiration.description: Tu sesión expirará en {countdown} segundos por inactividad.

SmtpSettingsForm.title: Configuración de Correo (SMTP)
SmtpSettingsForm.description: Configura tu servidor SMTP externo para enviar correos, como invitaciones a usuarios.
SmtpSettingsForm.descriptionDb: Configura tu servidor SMTP externo para enviar correos. Los cambios se guardan en la base de datos.
SmtpSettingsForm.instruction1: Crea o abre el archivo `.env.local` en el directorio raíz de tu proyecto.
SmtpSettingsForm.instruction2: Añade las siguientes líneas al archivo, reemplazando los valores de ejemplo con los detalles de tu servidor SMTP real:
SmtpSettingsForm.instruction3: Reinicia el servidor de tu aplicación para que los cambios surtan efecto.
SmtpSettingsForm.passPlaceholder: Dejar en blanco para no cambiar
SmtpSettingsForm.saveSuccessDescription: Tus ajustes de SMTP han sido guardados.
SmtpSettingsForm.errorFetchingSettings: Error al obtener los ajustes SMTP de la base de datos.

AiSettingsForm.title: Configuración de Funciones de IA
AiSettingsForm.description: Configura la integración de Genkit AI para habilitar funciones como los reportes asistidos por IA.
AiSettingsForm.instruction1: Crea o abre el archivo `.env` en el directorio raíz de tu proyecto.
AiSettingsForm.instruction2: Añade la siguiente línea, reemplazando el marcador de posición con tu Clave API de Gemini real:
AiSettingsForm.instruction3: Reinicia el servidor de tu aplicación para que los cambios surtan efecto.

POSBehaviorSettingsForm.title: Comportamientos del Punto de Venta
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.description: Personaliza cómo opera la pantalla del Punto de Venta.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.requireAuthForCartItemRemovalDescription: Si está activado, un usuario con permisos suficientes debe ingresar un código de autorización para eliminar un artículo del carrito.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.dispatchAtSaleDefaultLabel: Marcar 'Despachar en la Venta' por defecto
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.dispatchAtSaleDefaultDescription: Si está activado, la casilla para despachar el inventario inmediatamente al completar una venta estará marcada por defecto.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.saveSuccessDescription: La configuración de comportamiento del PDV ha sido guardada.
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.separateCartAndPaymentLabel: Separar Paneles de Carrito y Pago
POSBehaviorSettingsForm.separateCartAndPaymentDescription: Si está activado, la lista de artículos del carrito y el panel de pago/resumen estarán en pestañas separadas en lugar de una sola vista.

ReceiptSettingsForm.title: Configuración de Recibos
ReceiptSettingsForm.description: Personaliza la apariencia y el contenido de tus recibos impresos y digitales.
ReceiptSettingsForm.footerTextLabel: Texto del Pie de Página (usa \n para nuevas líneas)

ReceiptSettingsForm.saveSuccessDescription: La configuración de tu recibo ha sido guardada.
ReceiptSettingsForm.errorSavingSettings: Error al guardar la configuración del recibo
